nodes.bodyText: while we are changing the EventLoopGroup to Epoll, we should probably change the ServerSocketChannel to Epoll as well. I suspect that crash was caused by the incompatible EventLoopGroup with ServerSocketChannel.
https://github.com/netty/netty/blob/4.1/transport/src/main/java/io/netty/channel/nio/AbstractNioChannel.java#L372 This should be where the check is performed.
That is right, and the epoll usage should be consistent.
